body_html:
Same goes for real_data.
Like in the regular Estimator API I would like to pass in None or any other value I like and do the handling of the input data myself instead of the framework trying to convert it to a tensor for me.

body:
Same goes for `real_data`.
Like in the regular `Estimator` API I would like to pass in `None` or any other value I like and do the handling of the input data myself instead of the framework trying to convert it to a tensor for me.
